short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export LinkedIn post data to CSV or webhooks for lead generation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LeadSnipr is the ultimate tool for extracting and managing data from LinkedIn posts. Whether you're looking to export post data for analysis or automate workflows via webhooks, LeadSnipr makes it easy. With our extension, you can:

* Export LinkedIn post data directly to CSV.
* Set up automated data transfers via Clay webhook integrations.
* Manage your webhooks with full CRUD functionality, all within the 
   extension.
Streamline your LinkedIn data workflows and take control of your insights with LeadSnipr!
